Can only be used if character has inflicted damage on a target since the beginning of the previous round (which can include themselves). If Focus Power Test succeeds, character gains +5 to their next Focus Power test for each point of damage inflicted with this previous attack, this bonus dissapears if not used within 1 hour.
If power is Successfully manifested, gain Corruption Points equal to the Psy Rating used to manifest this power after its effects have been resolved.
